title: NEW PLAYERS IN RANKED GAMES!
body: Is there any way to implement a system for new players after they are at the level to play ranked games.So they can better understand the importance of ranked games vs normal games to learn the game,item builds,situational item builds and champion game play.Not all players learn this during leveling for some reason it seems,but if there are some certain criteria they have to obtain before doing placements and ranked games. I think this could possibly help the so called (elo hell!) and help with the over lol community.If there is a better place to post to be heard or taken into consideration please let me know. ty!

replies.body:
I'm locking this post due to its age as well as involving the OP arguing with other posters..

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification) or [Discuss the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation).

its the players own decisions.

and if you are being matched with new players, you might want to rank up.

You are not understanding the post. When people tell people to rank up, its just not that simple if you are constantly matched with people fresh new to ranked play.

Not everyone plays carry champs. If you are a support..no matter how many right plays you make if you have people running around not knowing what to do..understanding where to be when key objectives are about to respawn, you are going to lose.

If you have that 1 master yi who no matter how far behind he is he still going to ult and dive into the enemy 1v5 because he thinks the 5th time will be the charm you are going to lose.

if i mid i play control mages like Ziggs and Zyra. i dont play champs like Yasuo or Zed.......im not really going to carry even if i go 5-1 in lane.....if the rest of the team gets behind we are going to lose.

I main support but dont even que up support because im getting people that when i check their history they are playing champs they dont use....taking teleport on adc for whatever reason. Or building beserker boots and hurricane as their 1st 2 items. Or adcs that frontline and attack from melee range like they are the tank.

Really? lol ....grown ass man looking up old posts just to send someone a message lol.

Seriously.... I remove you from friends list and block you so you actually looked up a old post just to stalk me to send me a message lol. 

Grow up man, act your age and not like a child. I could call you stupid names back but unlike you i realize this is the INTERNET...so of course you have keyboard courage.

Hope all goes well in your life

Exactly!Another big deal is players in lower elos dont know how to win or finish a game,they get ahead and want to keep farming so they can get more items and there (S).But besides that the main thing is OBJECTIVES!NEW PLAYERS dont understand objectives,item builds,match ups,positioning,team comps etc.There are so many different variables to league and takes at least for most players up to 6 months of constant game play to even have a sense of being half decent.Just in a weeks time i can go up and down from silver 2 back down to 5 back up then back down,win 5,6,7 10 games in a Rowe then BAM! LOSE THE SAME RIGHT BACK AGAIN it is insane!Placements shouldn't just relay on wins and loses only.Yes that player that got carried and placed higher then they should will lose and be where they should be,but in the matches they lose they bring down the players that are in elo hell!PLEASE THERE HAS TO BE A NEW SYSTEM IMPLEMENTED FOR RANKED AND PLACEMENTS TO IMPROVE LOL!

I WISH IT WAS THAT EASY!Even top streamers complain that one person let alone 2 or even 3 feeders or purposefully unhelpful players can lose a match so ez.You can be fed get 20 plus kills and still lose it happens all the time its unbearable.I have had matches where I carry on kills and do up to 80 k plus damage to champs in a 40 min plus game and still lose,our team will do twice the damage as theres but because they have 2 to 3 tanks and cc BAM! INSTA LOSS,if ur a newer player and dont know how to close out and win.Just so frustrating.

Dude you are still in elo hell bro!For what your showing and still being in bronze 2 is a PRIME  example of EXACTLY  what im trying to say.Yo have all that great kd and win% but no wins to show for it PROVING ME CORRECT because it take multiple win streaks to climb!So sick and tired of win loss win win loss loss win win win loss loss loss loss win loss etc.You catch my drift.
